LanguageData.GR_Chickenbear.label: chickenbear
LanguageData.GR_Chickenbear.description: A chicken / bear hybrid. Lays eggs, and can defend itself in combat slightly better than a chicken. \n\nUseful abilities: Their sharp, small teeth can be harvested when butchering them, and they are slightly valuable and lightweight.
LanguageData.GR_Chickenbear.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.GR_Chickenbear.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Chickenbear_Corpse.label: chickenbear corpse
LanguageData.GR_Chickenlope.label: chickenlope
LanguageData.GR_Chickenlope.description: A chicken / boomalope hybrid. This sickly looking creature is basically useless. Now, if you gather a lot of them, and kill them in a chain reaction... \n\nUseful abilities: Explodes on death. Produces minute amounts of chemfuel every day.
LanguageData.GR_Chickenlope.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.GR_Chickenlope.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Chickenlope_Corpse.label: chickenlope corpse
LanguageData.GR_Chickenffalo.label: chickenffalo
LanguageData.GR_Chickenffalo.description: A chicken / muffalo hybrid. Lays eggs, produces milk, wool and can be used as a pack beast. Of course, it doesn't excel at ANY of those things, but it's the price you pay for convenience. They are so cute, though, wearing their tiny bags...
LanguageData.GR_Chickenffalo.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.GR_Chickenffalo.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Chickenffalo_Corpse.label: chickenffalo corpse
LanguageData.GR_Chickenwolf.label: chickenwolf
LanguageData.GR_Chickenwolf.description: A chicken / wolf hybrid. Fast moving, and with a nasty bite! \n\nUseful abilities: Their sharp, small teeth can be harvested when butchering them, and they are slightly valuable and lightweight.
LanguageData.GR_Chickenwolf.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.GR_Chickenwolf.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Chickenwolf_Corpse.label: chickenwolf corpse
LanguageData.GR_Chickenrabbit.label: chickenrabbit
LanguageData.GR_Chickenrabbit.description: A Chicken / Rabbit hybrid. What happens when you artificially crossbreed two fast breeding creatures? The chickenrabbit is an ecological disaster waiting to happen.\n\nUseful abilities: Egg layer. EXTREMELY fast breeding.
LanguageData.GR_Chickenrabbit.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.GR_Chickenrabbit.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Chickenrabbit_Corpse.label: chickenrabbit corpse
LanguageData.GR_Chickencat.label: chickencat
LanguageData.GR_Chickencat.description: A chicken / cat hybrid. Fast moving, specially intelligent. It is one of the few chicken hybrids that can be somewhat trained.\n\nUseful abilities: Like all cat hybrids, they have an improved melee dodge ability, making them perfect for the front lines, and a short nuzzle period. The chickencat obviously produces eggs.
LanguageData.GR_Chickencat.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.GR_Chickencat.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Chickencat_Corpse.label: chickencat corpse
